column7: to the dwellers in the plains below
column8: seemed to reach to the very sky. At times its summit was covered with clouds
column9: so that it could not be seen; at other times it stood out fair and clear
column10: as though silently asking the people to look up and not down. The lower slopes of the mountain were covered with olive trees
column11: with groves of oranges and lemons
column13: and they were dotted here and there with the little white cottages of the peasants who made their living from these groves and vineyards
column14: the fruit of which they sold in the city not far away.
